title: Pumpkin Spice Murder
description: *This is book 17 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*  A celebratory haunt turns out to be closer to reality than fantasy when Missy's Halloween masquerade becomes a crime scene. With few clues and only murky information about just what is going on in the spooky new town, Missy must team up with artist Kel and set a trap for the killer!
author: Summer  Prescott
